Mm.
 Are you crazy? She'll kill me. Do you know what she's like?

 - Đêm nay là của cậu. - Thật à?

-No, are you serious, or what? -Come on, lighten up.
 We'll bring her along.

She doesn't mind. Oh, she'll love it.
 - Oh, yeah, it is so good. -Yeah, yeah, she'll love it.

Okay, all right.
 Okurrr!

Une personne de moins d'1,60 m.

Well, he still has a way to go
 before he gets to break bread with the big guys.

- Un enfant, lui, avec son gros corps ? - Ferme ta gueule.

-He's a kid? Look at the size of him.
 Shut your mouth!

No, I haven't paid it.
 We don't have the money. We'll pay it next month.

 Key Club.
